trans-unit.source: Enables you to specify multiple fields for display, per item in an object list.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您指定多個欄位依物件清單中每個項目顯示。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: Much of the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>, including support for templated rendering through device template sets and internal pagination, is similar to the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的行為<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>，包括支援樣板化呈現，透過裝置範本集和內部分頁的行為類似<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Introduction to the ObjectList Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/527ca783-0ff9-4247-b407-8e58d093faa9) or the [Pagination](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2) documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ObjectList 控制項簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/527ca783-0ff9-4247-b407-8e58d093faa9)或[分頁](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an array of a user-defined class and then bind it to an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object when the page loads.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用者定義的類別的陣列，然後再將它繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>物件載入頁面時。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how the list and details views display the commands.
trans-unit.target: 它也會顯示清單和詳細資料檢視方式顯示命令。

trans-unit.source: For this example, there is also a button that displays a form with a list of all the fields using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中，沒有也會顯示的表單清單使用的所有欄位的按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of all fields from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> class, whether explicit or automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: 無論明確產生或自動產生，都從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 類別傳回所有欄位的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the collection of automatically generated fields.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是自動產生欄位的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection" /> object containing all fields in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection" /> 物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 中的所有欄位。

trans-unit.source: This collection is available only after data binding.
trans-unit.target: 只有在資料繫結之後，這個集合是可用的。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Fields%2A> collection, you cannot add or remove items in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Fields%2A>集合，您無法加入或移除此集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: By default, this collection is the set of automatically generated fields.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個集合是一組自動產生的欄位。

trans-unit.source: If any fields are explicitly defined, they are contained after any automatically generated fields.
trans-unit.target: 如果已明確定義任何欄位，而且包含在任何自動產生的欄位之後。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields%2A> property to list all the fields of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields%2A>屬性，以列出的所有欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> overview.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether fields must be automatically generated from data.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否必須從資料自動產生欄位。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, each public property of the data becomes a field of the control.
trans-unit.target: 啟用時，資料的每個公用 (Public) 屬性會變成控制項的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the fields are automatically generated from data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果從資料自動產生欄位則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When `true`, the object list handles the fields order in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 當`true`，[物件] 清單會處理中的欄位順序<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: When `false`, you must specify the order of the fields and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.DataItem%2A> property to bind to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 當`false`，您必須指定欄位的順序，並設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.DataItem%2A>繫結至資料來源的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AutoGenerateFields%2A> property to statically associate the fields with their collection in the Details view of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AutoGenerateFields%2A>以靜態方式的詳細資料檢視中的集合與相關聯的欄位屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If this property is programmatically set, it is not persisted unless the property is set dynamically on each request.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式設定這個屬性，如果它不會保存除非屬性以動態方式設定每個要求。

trans-unit.source: If the property is set declaratively, the property is set on each request.
trans-unit.target: 如果以宣告方式設定屬性，屬性會設定每個要求。

trans-unit.source: There is no default.
trans-unit.target: 沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Since different devices have different requirements for styles.
trans-unit.target: 由於不同的裝置有不同的樣式的需求。

trans-unit.source: You may want several <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.DeviceSpecific%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CommandStyle%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data member to extract when data binding to a list data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料繫結 (Data Binding) 至清單資料來源時，要擷取的資料成員。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The data member to extract from the data source when data binding to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 時，要從資料來源擷取的資料成員。

trans-unit.source: This property is only used if the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataSource%2A> property is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, rather than of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: 若只會用於這個屬性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataSource%2A>屬性屬於型別<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>，而不是型別<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source of the list that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定正在進行繫結之清單的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 null。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The data source of the list that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: 正在進行繫結之清單的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: To bind a data source to a list, you must first use the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataBind%2A> method to ensure data binding.
trans-unit.target: 若要將資料來源繫結至清單，您必須先使用控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataBind%2A>方法，以確保資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: The data source can be of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> or of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源可以是類型<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>或型別<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>。

trans-unit.source: If the data source is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataMember%2A> field to specify which member to extract.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源的類型<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataMember%2A>欄位來指定要擷取的成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the default command.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定預設命令的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The name of the default command.
trans-unit.target: 預設命令的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control attempts to render a shortcut to invoke the default command.
trans-unit.target: 設定時，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控制項嘗試呈現叫用的預設命令的捷徑。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, the default rendering in list view displays the first field as a link to the details view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，在清單檢視中的預設轉譯會第一個欄位顯示為詳細資料 檢視的連結<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property is set, clicking the link invokes the default command.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>屬性設定，則按一下連結會叫用的預設命令。

trans-unit.source: Invoking the default command raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 叫用的預設命令引發<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs> object is set to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>物件設定的值為<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Even if a default command is defined, you should include a command with the same name in the commands collection.
trans-unit.target: 即使定義預設的命令，您應該具有相同名稱的命令集合中包含的命令。

trans-unit.source: If the control cannot render a graphical element that includes a shortcut for the default command, the default command is still available through the rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> commands collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項無法呈現圖形元素包含預設命令的捷徑，預設值命令，還是可以透過呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>命令集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the panel that contains a device-specific details view.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含特定裝置詳細資料檢視的面版。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: A panel that contains a device-specific details view.
trans-unit.target: 包含裝置特定詳細資料檢視的面板。

trans-unit.source: The details view has a table that lists each field title and value.
trans-unit.target: 詳細資料檢視有一份列出每個欄位標題和值。

trans-unit.source: In addition, it lists all the commands associated with an item.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它會列出所有與項目相關聯的命令。

trans-unit.source: For some devices, this view also contains a link that returns the user to the list view.
trans-unit.target: 至於部分裝置，此檢視也會包含清單檢視會傳回使用者的連結。

trans-unit.source: the current view is not the details view.
trans-unit.target: 目前的檢視不是詳細資料檢視。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text used for the menu item that shows the details view.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示詳細資料檢視之功能表項目所使用的文字。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The text used for the menu item that shows the details view.
trans-unit.target: 顯示詳細資料檢視之功能表項目所使用的文字。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set a string that is longer than can be displayed, the default value is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試設定超過可以顯示的字串，則會顯示預設值。

trans-unit.source: The default text is "Go".
trans-unit.target: 預設的文字為"Go"。

trans-unit.source: This label is displayed only on WAP browsers.
trans-unit.target: 此標籤會顯示只在 WAP 瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the server control contains child controls.
trans-unit.target: 判斷伺服器控制項是否包含子控制項。

trans-unit.source: If it does not, it creates child controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果不包含，則建立子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to ensure that the templates are instantiated to allow programmatic access to the instantiated contents of a template.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法確認樣板已具現化 (Instantiated)，以允許用程式設計方式存取樣板的具現化內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of explicitly defined fields in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection" /> 類別中已明確定義欄位的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of explicitly defined fields for the object list control.
trans-unit.target: 物件清單控制項之明確定義的欄位集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add or remove fields in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.AddAt%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入或移除集合中的欄位，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.AddAt%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.Remove%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> control has an event handler registered for the appropriate <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 控制項是否具有為適當 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" /> 事件註冊的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object list control has an event handler registered for the appropriate <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" /> event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件清單控制項具有為適當的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" /> 事件註冊的事件處理常式，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 無。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user selects a command that is associated with an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> item.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者選取與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 項目關聯的命令時。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event handler is defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> notifies the handler when an item event is generated through user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>定義事件處理常式，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>項目產生一個事件會透過使用者互動時，通知處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When you render an object list by using templates, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event handler is called through the event-bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本，轉譯的物件清單<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>透過事件反昇機制之 ASP.NET 呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is passed an argument of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>, which contains information about the source item and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the control that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式傳遞的型別引數<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>，其中包含有關來源項目的資訊和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>產生事件的控制項屬性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to render a single item with multiple associated interactions.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您呈現單一項目具有多個相關聯的互動。

trans-unit.source: On default rendering, the control renders each of the commands defined for the object list as a link.
trans-unit.target: 在預設呈現控制項呈現每個命令定義為連結的物件清單。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks a link, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event handler is called with an argument of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>, which contains information about the source item.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下連結，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>與類型的引數呼叫事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>，其中包含來源項目的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The value in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property is the name of the command that the user invoked.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>屬性是使用者叫用命令的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to trap the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何捕捉<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property specifies what action to perform.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>屬性會指定要執行什麼動作。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> is bound to data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 中的項目繫結至資料時會發生。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: When an item in an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> is created and data-bound, this event handler sets the properties of the list item from arbitrary expressions.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目時<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>建立和資料繫結，此事件處理常式可設定的屬性清單項目從任意的運算式。

trans-unit.source: An item in an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control is of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItem>.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控制項屬於類型<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItem>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use either the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.ListItem%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.DataItem%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs> collection to determine further action.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.ListItem%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.DataItem%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs>判斷進一步的動作集合。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>概觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of items in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItemCollection" /> list.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItemCollection" /> 清單中項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is empty, which causes the first field in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" /> collection to be used as a label for each item.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空白的，這會造成 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" /> 集合中的第一個欄位被當做每個項目的標籤。

trans-unit.source: The style used for the header label.
trans-unit.target: 標頭標籤所使用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property in code is not persisted between requests, so if you want the style to be consistently set, you must set the property on each request.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼中設定這個屬性不會保存之間的要求，因此如果您想要以一致的方式設定樣式，您必須設定屬性的每一個要求。

trans-unit.source: If the property is set declaratively, the property is persisted between requests.
trans-unit.target: 如果以宣告方式設定屬性，屬性會保存在要求之間。

trans-unit.source: In addition, setting the property declaratively allows you to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific>/`Choice` structure to set the property for various devices.
trans-unit.target: 此外，以宣告方式設定屬性可讓您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific> / `Choice`結構來設定各種裝置的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text string used for the <see langword="More" /> link used on HTML browsers to navigate to the details view.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在 HTML 瀏覽器上 <see langword="More" /> 連結使用的文字字串，以巡覽至詳細資料檢視。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="More" /> or the localized equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 預設是 <see langword="More" /> 或對等的當地語系化文字。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: The text string used for the <see langword="More" /> link used on HTML browsers to navigate to the details view.
trans-unit.target: HTML 瀏覽器上 <see langword="More" /> 連結使用的文字字串，用以巡覽至詳細資料檢視。

trans-unit.source: The `More` link is rendered to provide a link from the `ListView` of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> to the `DetailsView` of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: `More`連結會轉譯提供的連結，`ListView`的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>至`DetailsView`的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: The following conditions must be met for the `More` link to be rendered:
trans-unit.target: 必須符合下列條件`More`来呈現的連結：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property must be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>屬性必須設定。

trans-unit.source: There must be additional fields or commands to be rendered in the details view.
trans-unit.target: 必須有額外的欄位或命令，在詳細資料檢視中轉譯。

trans-unit.source: The default rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> displays the first field in the `ListView` as a link to the `DetailsView` page.
trans-unit.target: 預設呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>顯示的第一個欄位`ListView`連結為`DetailsView`頁面。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property overrides this link and causes it to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>屬性會覆寫此連結，並與引發它<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the `More` link is rendered to provide a link to the `DetailsView`.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，`More`連結會轉譯到提供的連結`DetailsView`。

trans-unit.source: This property is not the same as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DetailsCommandText%2A> property, which is used on WAP browsers.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不相同<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DetailsCommandText%2A>WAP 瀏覽器所用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: the value is less than zero or larger than or equal to the number of items in the list.

trans-unit.source: The event argument contains a reference to the item and to the collection of commands.
trans-unit.target: 事件引數包含參考的項目和命令的集合。

trans-unit.source: An event handler can customize the collection according to the item.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式可以自訂根據項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Applications can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event to provide functionality equivalent to item-specific shortcut menus.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>事件以提供的功能相當於項目特定的快顯功能表。

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the collection of commands during this event are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 命令的集合，在此事件期間所做的變更不會保存。

trans-unit.source: This event is called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect> event is called.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件之後，就會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect>事件被呼叫。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform other tasks before showing the detail view.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件，以顯示詳細資料檢視之前執行其他工作。

trans-unit.source: You can add, remove, or rearrange fields, depending on the item selected in the list view.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增、 移除或重新排列欄位，根據清單檢視中選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event to remove an item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection> of the detail view of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>事件中移除的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection>詳細資料檢視的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: The item to remove is selected in the list view.
trans-unit.target: 清單檢視中選取要移除的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: The optional event argument to be passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至事件處理常式的選擇性事件引數。

trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" />。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of indices within the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" /> collection of the fields in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFields" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" /> 屬性中欄位之 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFields" /> 集合內的索引陣列。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: An array of integers representing the indices of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 整數陣列，表示 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" /> 集合的索引。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control has not been bound to a data source or no items have been added, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFieldIndices%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控制項具有未繫結到資料來源，或尚未加入任何項目，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFieldIndices%2A>屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which fields are visible when the list view is shown in table mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當清單檢視以資料表模式顯示時哪些欄位是為可見的。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: A semicolon-delimited list of fields to be displayed when the list view is shown in table mode.
trans-unit.target: 當清單檢視以資料表模式顯示時，要顯示之欄位的以分號分隔清單。

trans-unit.source: This string must be a set of identifiers, separated by semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串必須是一組識別碼，並以分號分隔。

trans-unit.source: Each identifier indicates the name or data field of the field that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 每個識別項表示將會顯示欄位的名稱或資料欄位。

trans-unit.source: By default, the list view is never shown in table mode unless this property is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，清單檢視是永遠不會顯示在表格模式中除非這個屬性不是空。

trans-unit.source: For a complete code sample, see the example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的程式碼範例，請參閱範例<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>概觀。

trans-unit.source: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 導致對伺服器控制項的檢視狀態變更的追蹤 (Tracking)，以便它們能夠儲存於伺服器控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件可透過 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> 屬性存取。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the view mode of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 的檢視模式。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode" /> value representing the view mode of the object list.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode" /> 值，表示物件清單的檢視模式。

trans-unit.source: The following options are available for this property through the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 透過這個屬性有下列選項<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Member Name
trans-unit.target: 成員名稱

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: This is the default view displayed when the page containing the object list is rendered for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 這是第一次呈現包含物件清單的頁面時，預設顯示的檢視。

trans-unit.source: It consists of either the label fields of the items, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFields%2A> property is not empty, a table with columns corresponding to the table fields and rows for the items.
trans-unit.target: 它會包含標籤的欄位項目，或如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFields%2A>屬性不是空白，對應於表格欄位的資料行的資料表和資料列的項目。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, this view is combined with the Commands view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the list.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，這個檢視結合命令檢視，顯示為超連結，清單下方的命令。

trans-unit.source: When there is more information in the Details view, a hyperlink for each item displaying the Details view is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 在詳細資料檢視的詳細資訊時，會轉譯超連結顯示詳細資料檢視每個項目。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, this view is combined with the Commands view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，這個檢視結合命令檢視，顯示為超連結，詳細資料如下的命令。

trans-unit.source: This view is rendered separately only for WML devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個檢視只會為 WML 裝置個別呈現。

trans-unit.source: It consists of a menu with the commands of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 它包含的命令及功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: For HTML devices, the List view and Details view are each combined with this view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details or list.
trans-unit.target: HTML 裝置的清單檢視與 詳細資料檢視會每個與結合此檢視中，顯示為超連結，詳細資料或清單下方的命令。

trans-unit.source: To set this property in code, an item in the list must be selected before setting this property to <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode.Commands> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode.Details> view.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼中設定此屬性，您必須選取清單中的項目才能將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode.Commands>或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode.Details>檢視。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property before selecting an item throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試選取項目就會擲回的例外狀況之前設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: A view mode is persisted in a private view state, so that, regardless of whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object is `true`, the view mode is persisted as a private field.
trans-unit.target: 檢視模式中保存的私用檢視狀態，因此，無論<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>物件是`true`，檢視模式會保存為私用欄位。

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is `false`, the items collection is not persisted between requests, requiring a data bind to be repeated for each request.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性是`false`，需要針對每個要求重複的資料繫結的要求之間不會保留項目集合。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode.List" /> while no item was selected.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將這個屬性設為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode.List" /> 以外的其他值，但並未選取任何項目。
